summary.title: Brew & Bloom Coffee Co.
summary.description: The Brew & Bloom Coffee Co. Ordering Application can be decomposed into the following key components and their interactions, forming the basis for identifying trust boundaries and data flows.

data.name: User
data.description: Customer, Barista, Manager, Admin all uses the same login system

data.name: Web Application Server
data.description: Handles Authentication, Orders, Menu, Reports, Payments

data.name: Web Application Server
data.description: Handles: Manager authentication, Authorization checks, Sales report generation, Formatting data

data.name: MongoDB Database
data.description: Stores: Sales records, Orders, Transaction history

data.name: Manager
data.description: Performs: Login, Report request, Report viewing

threats.title: T-002 Staff Account Spoofing
threats.description:
An attacker could impersonate staff to manipulate order statuses,
access sales reports, or modify menu items and application
configurations.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A
